item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 19, 2024 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:

9. J2ME-Loader: J2ME emulator for Android devices (76 points | 31 comments)

14. OpenTelemetry and vendor neutrality: how to build an observability strategy (111 points | 26 comments)

25. Meticulous (YC S21) is hiring to eliminate UI tests ( | hide)

27. Compile and Run C in JavaScript (55 points | 14 comments)

29. An effective and rapidly degradable disinfectant from disinfection byproducts (14 points | discuss)
30. Comic Mono (385 points | 102 comments)
